title: Hey, I need help
body:
I have terrible decision making skills and my knowledge of the meta is quite poor :/... my knowledge is restricted to a few certain things like sustain assassin evelyn/rengar. I need some advice preferably in game from anyone willing to help

my ign is this account (Chicken4Dinner)

Edit: it's great to see people coming to help, I am b2 myself if this means anything but I would appreciate what you guys would have to say (atm it is 1;30am so I gotta sleep lol but tomorrow I will definitely follow you up)

Edit 2, I'm going to send friend requests to those who offered me help, thumb up to blarke that already did that

replies.body:
I'm not the best player but I'll help you out a bit if you want
:^)
i may be only b2 but ik alot about champions mechanics for most champions so ill be glad to help

Hey my main is lvl 27 and i am a good assasin/tank player. My main is Boomshakalacka and if you are willing to take advice from me i would greatfully help you :) i main Cassiopeia, Zed, Yas, Rek'Sai and Jax
I think I saw you in a game recently, as Braum???
Yeah, I don't have braum but i have played a game with u before i think XD

You cant go wrong with {{champion:86}} or {{champion:32}} :)

that's a {{champion:86}} tee

Anyway, get me some chicken for dinner, then we talk.
Where do you live? ill post it ;)
XD I don't have a card so I can't just order it for you, sorry about getting your hopes up lol
